title.rendered: Air Asia arrival / departure and terminal details all over the airports

content.rendered:
Check the airport and terminals where AirAsia operating all over the world.

AirAsia Australia

  • AirAsia operates from Darwin International Airport in Darwin (DRW).
  • AirAsia operates from Coolangatta Airport in Gold Coast (OOL).
  • AirAsia operates from terminal 2 of Melbourne Airport in Melbourne (MEL).
  • AirAsia operates from terminal 1 of Perth International Airport in Perth (PER).
  • AirAsia operates from terminal 1 of Sydney (Kingsford Smith) Airport in Sydney (SYD).

AirAsia Bangladesh

AirAsia operates from Hazrat Shahjalal International Airport in Dhaka (DAC).

AirAsia Brunei

AirAsia operates from Brunei International Airport in Brunei (BWN).

AirAsia Cambodia

  • AirAsia operates from Phnom Penh International Airport in Phnom Penh (PNH).
  • AirAsia operates from Siem Reap International Airport in Siem Reap (REP).

AirAsia China

View AirAsia operates from the terminals of airports in China.

Destination Airport Terminal

Changsha (CSX) Changsha Huanghua International Airport
Chengdu (CTU) Chengdu Shuangliu International Airport Terminal 1
Chongqing (CKG) Chongqing Jiangbei International Airport Terminal 1
Guangzhou (CAN) Baiyun International Airport
Guilin (KWL) Guilin Liangjiang International Airport

Kunming (KMG) Kunming Changshui International Airport

Shenzhen (SZX) Bao’an International Airport Terminal 3
Wuhan (WUH) Wuhan Tianhe International Airport
Xi’an (XIY) Xi`an Xianyang International Airport Terminal 3

AirAsia Hong Kong

AirAsia operates from terminal 2 of Hong Kong International Airport in Hong Kong (HKG).

AirAsia Japan

  • AirAsia operates from Kansai International Airport in Osaka – Kansai (KIX).
  • AirAsia operates from Shin Chitose Airport in Sapporo – Shin-Chitose (CTS).
  • AirAsia operates from Tokyo International Airport in Tokyo – Haneda (HND).
  • AirAsia operates from terminal 2 of Narita International Airport in Tokyo – Narita (NRT).

AirAsia Laos

AirAsia operates from Wattay International Airport in Vientiane (VTE).

AirAsia Macao

AirAsia operates from Macao International Airport in Macao (MFM).

AirAsia Maldives

AirAsia operates from Velana International Airport in Male (MLE).

  • AirAsia operates from terminal 1 of Yangon International Airport in Yangon (RGN).

AirAsia Nepal

AirAsia operates from Tribhuvan International Airport in Kathmandu (KTM).

AirAsia New Zealand

AirAsia operates from Auckland Airport in Auckland (AKL).

AirAsia Saudi Arabia

AirAsia operates from King Abdulaziz International Airport in Jeddah (JED).

AirAsia Singapore

AirAsia operates from terminal 1 of Changi Airport in Singapore (SIN).

AirAsia South Korea

  • AirAsia operates from Gimhae International Airport in Busan (PUS).
  • AirAsia operates from Seoul International Airport in Seoul (ICN).

AirAsia Sri Lanka

AirAsia operates from Bandaranayake International Airport in Colombo (CMB).

AirAsia Taiwan

  • AirAsia operates from Kaohsiung International Airport in Kaohsiung (KHH).
  • AirAsia operates from terminal 1 of Taoyuan International Airport in Taipei (TPE).

AirAsia Thailand

AirAsia Vietnam

  • AirAsia operates from terminal 2 of Da Nang International Airport in Da Nang (DAD).
  • AirAsia operates from Noi Bai International Airport in Hanoi (HAN).
  • AirAsia operates from terminal 2 of Tan Son Nhat International Airport in Ho Chi Minh City (SGN).

AirAsia United States

AirAsia operates from Honolulu International Airport in Honolulu (HNL), USA.

For more details, visit Airport and termainals of AirAsia
